Card1.Title: Qualifying
Card1.Description: Where do LLMs live in our professional practices, norms and relationships?

Content.subtitle: Exercise 1 - Breaking the Ice
Content.text: In this exercise, participants are encouraged to share unique facts about themselves to build rapport. This activity not only helps to set a friendly tone but also fosters connections by highlighting shared interests and experiences among the group. It’s an opportunity for everyone to feel seen and heard in a relaxed setting.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 2 - Taking Stocks
Content.text: This phase involves assessing current strengths and weaknesses. Participants reflect on their achievements, identify growth areas, and discuss obstacles they've faced. Through guided prompts, this exercise promotes self-awareness and sets a foundation for planning future goals. It's a moment for introspection and honest evaluation.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 3 - Bon Anneè
Content.text: Celebrate milestones and set goals for the future. Participants take time to appreciate their progress, acknowledge their accomplishments, and craft personal and professional resolutions. This reflective process aims to boost motivation and provide clarity on the next steps in their journey. It’s about starting the new phase with intention and focus.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 4 - Collaborative Challenge
Content.text: Teams collaborate on solving complex puzzles or scenarios that require creativity and cooperation. The challenges are designed to encourage problem-solving under pressure, fostering teamwork and adaptability. By working together, participants learn to value diverse perspectives and leverage each other's strengths.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 5 - Vision Crafting
Content.text: Participants visualize their ideal outcomes and articulate a clear vision for their personal or professional paths. Through guided exercises, they create vision boards or write detailed descriptions of their goals. This process not only fosters inspiration but also provides a tangible roadmap for future action.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 6 - Feedback Loop
Content.text: Engage in a structured feedback exchange where participants give and receive constructive insights to encourage improvement. Feedback is framed positively to ensure it is both actionable and supportive. This exercise builds a culture of trust and open communication, emphasizing growth over criticism.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 7 - Reflection and Gratitude
Content.text: Participants reflect on their journey, express gratitude for the support they have received, and recognize key lessons learned. Through storytelling and sharing, the group collectively reinforces their achievements. This session closes the exercise series on a high note, with a focus on connection and appreciation.

Card2.Title: Benchmarking
Card2.Description: How do we judge the performance of an LLM?

Content.subtitle: Exercise 1 - Breaking the Ice
Content.text: Participants share spontaneous descriptions of abstract images to spark creativity and open their minds to new perspectives.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 2 - Taking Stocks
Content.text: This exercise focuses on analyzing visual elements in detail, encouraging participants to articulate their thoughts with precision.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 3 - Bon Anneè
Content.text: Reflect on how visual representations influence personal interpretations and compare perspectives within the group.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 4 - Visual Storytelling
Content.text: Create narratives based on image sequences, blending imagination and structured communication.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 5 - Collaborative Ekphrasis
Content.text: Work in pairs or teams to construct descriptions of challenging visuals, enhancing collaborative analysis and creativity.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 6 - Abstract Exploration
Content.text: Dive into abstract images and explore how emotions and context affect interpretation.

Content.subtitle: Exercise 7 - Reflective Wrap-Up
Content.text: Participants share their key insights and discuss the power of visual literacy in communication.

projectDescription: The Écologies des Pratiques project explores the transformative impact of Large Language Models...
